items.sentence: All our teachers were young and loved teaching.
All you have to do is apologize for being late.
Doing that took longer than I thought it would.
Where did the girl that you were talking to go?
No one can come in here without our permission.
Tom's house is on the south side of the island.
Tom gradually began to lose his sense of smell.
Tom stopped at a pharmacy to get some medicine.
I wonder whether or not Tom will do that today.
I wonder whether or not Tom will be here today.
